biocontainers.name: gofasta
biocontainers.summary: Some functions for working on alignments in fasta format

biotools.summary: gofasta is a command-line utility developed to handle SARS-CoV-2 alignments, but should be useful more generally for handling consensus genomes of any microbial pathogen. It is used on datasets of millions of sequences, including by the United Kingdom's daily SARS-CoV-2 genome processing pipelines, Pangolin and Civet.

bioschemas.name: gofasta
